import React,{useCallback,useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{changeField,initalize}from'../../modules/write';import Editor from'../../components/write/Editor';var EditorContainer=function EditorContainer(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var _useSelector=useSelector(function(_ref){var write=_ref.write;return{title:write.title,body:write.body};}),title=_useSelector.title,body=_useSelector.body;var onChangeField=useCallback(function(payload){return dispatch(changeField(payload));},[dispatch]);// 언마운트 될 때 초기화
useEffect(function(){return function(){dispatch(initalize());};},[dispatch]);return React.createElement(Editor,{onChangeField:onChangeField,title:title,body:body});};export default EditorContainer;
